components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description:
A graduation cap, worn on the head of students graduating from college or university. Known in some locations as a mortar board with tassel.

An early Apple design displayed a graduation shirt instead of a graduation cap.
components.title: Graduation Cap

description: A man who is engaged in education. Generally depicted wearing a black graduation gown and cap, and occasionally holding a degree certificate or diploma.
title: Man Student

emoji_net_data.definition: The Man Student emoji is a sequence of the ?? Man and ?? Graduation Cap emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each ch http://emojipedia.org/male-student/
emoji_net_data.name: man student

bn:00103718a: Of or relating to studies beyond a bachelor's degree
Those studies which take place after having successfully completed a degree course.
Studies taking place after completing a degree.

bn:00089006v: Receive an academic degree upon completion of one's studies
To obtain an academic degree upon completion of one's studies.

bn:00029806n: A student under the supervision of a teacher or professor.
Students are people who are engaged in learning, particularly those who attend an educational institution.
A person enrolled at a university.
A student is a learner, or someone who attends an educational institution.
Learner, or someone who attends an educational institution
A learner who is enrolled in an educational institution
A person who is enrolled in a class.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

bn:00003164n: An alumnus or alumna is a former student or pupil of a school, college, or university.
A unit of angle equal to 0.9 degrees, so that there are 100 gradians in a right angle.
A graduate of a university or other institution.
A person who is recognized by a high school as having completed the requirements of a course of study at the school
A graduate of a particular institution
A female pupil or student (especially of a university or college)
A person who has received a degree from a school (high school or college or university)
The gradian is a unit of plane angle, equivalent to of a turn.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's man student emoji is a smart and approachable figure, rendered with subtle 3D shading and realistic lighting that gives him a polished, academic feel. His soft, rounded edges and a slight hint of studiousness in his expression are hallmarks of Apple's character designs. This emoji is commonly used to represent learning, education, or someone engaged in academic pursuits.
